name: ScriptRPG 2
description:
ScriptRPG is a text based RPG game with customization

it's very limited right now, I need to do balancing, adding more enemies, weapons, armors, items and bosses,

and I need to make it look nice so it neds A LOT of assets still!

But the main structure of the game is done and ready for testing and input from the outside.

Currently it has:

a few enemies with drops,
1 boss
3 armors
a couple weapons
training system,
healing in the Inn
saving and loading save data
moddable enemies and weapons using JSON (the defaults are as example, those will be reset on restart)

you can use the included mod creator to create some mods, send me some cool content and I might add it into the base game.

I originally made this game in Batch, but I decided to recreate it in Unity C#

I hope you like it,

I'm open to any kind of suggestions, please give me input or feedback, it really helps me a ton.

Enjoy!
